Primary Contact: Shauna Wiebe, Behaviour Consultant; Phone: 250.801.0820; Email: shauna@ocai.ca
Alternate Contact: Kim Nutley, Behaviour Consultant; Phone: 250.801.2172; Email: kim@ocai.ca
Service Details: Provides Early Intensive Behaviour Intervention (EIBI) for children diagnosed with an Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) with the following services:  - initial assessment for programming- development of individualized EIBI program- monitoring and evaluating child’s progress- developing and implementing positive behaviour support (PBS) plans- liaising with speech language pathologists- occupational therapists- schools, supported child development and other professionals- training behaviour interventionists- facilitating parent workshops- providing community workshops
